TASK: Craft an item of type: trapped_chest
inventory=[{"type": "ladder", "quantity": 22, "index": 13}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 36, "index": 14}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 16, "index": 19}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 23, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 50, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a trapped_chest, I need to craft a tripwire_hook. A tripwire_hook requires 1 iron_ingot and 1 stick. I will first move the iron_ingot from slot 38 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
